availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Organized at Camp King in Louisville, Kentucky, in September 1863. Mustered in on September 10, 1863. Veteranized in February 1864. Mustered out on July 26, 1865. Commander(s): Captain John W. Neville and Captain Richard W. McReynolds.
One of the constituent batteries of the 1st Kentucky Light Artillery Regiment.

ab.bibl: Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), p. 509-510, 518-521.
